title: Adjust Pre‑Meditation guide buttons: move “More Details” to bottom and increase “Begin Meditation” height on small screens

requirements.text: Update the selected “More Details” button in the Pre‑Meditation page’s Meditation Guide container (selected element XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[3]/div[1]/button[1]) so it renders at the bottom of the guide container instead of in the guide header area, without changing its label or navigation behavior (it must still navigate to /knowledge with the current meditation type and scrollToContent search param).

quotes: place more details button ... in the bottom of guide container.
Only to the selected element yes(More details btn)

acceptanceCriteria: On PreMeditationPage (setup phase), the “More Details” button no longer appears next to the “Meditation Guide” heading.
The “More Details” button appears after the guide content (below the MeditationGuideStepper) within the same guide container card.
Clicking “More Details” still navigates to /knowledge with search params { category: selectedType, scrollToContent: true }.
No other buttons or text in the guide container are modified beyond what is required to reposition this selected button.

requirements.text: Update the selected “Begin Meditation” button (selected element XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/button[1]) so that on lower-width screens—when the action buttons area collapses from a 2-column/side-by-side layout into a single-column stack—its visual height increases to better match the “Save as Ritual” button. This change must only affect the small-screen stacked layout and must not change the button’s width or behavior.

quotes: Begin meditation button only height increased... when ... 2 columns, becomes 1 row (Lower width screens). So there is visual incosistency compared to "Save as Ritual" button

acceptanceCriteria: When the action buttons stack into a single column on small screens, the “Begin Meditation” button has increased height (e.g., via responsive min-height/padding) and no longer appears thinner than “Save as Ritual.”
On larger screens where the buttons remain side-by-side, the “Begin Meditation” button height remains unchanged from current desktop/tablet styling.
The “Begin Meditation” button continues to trigger the existing begin-meditation behavior (no logic changes).
No other elements besides the selected “Begin Meditation” button are restyled as part of this change.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the two user-selected elements identified by the provided XPaths.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not change routing, backend APIs, or the existing navigation logic for the “More Details” button beyond repositioning it in the UI.
nonGoals: Redesigning the entire Pre‑Meditation page layout.
Changing the “Save as Ritual” button styling or behavior.
Adding new buttons, new guide content, or new navigation destinations.
